body:
Hey everyone, I'm just kinda confused and upset at the moment :(
WHY in the world is the level of people leaving Avicus skyrocketing???
I don't see anything WRONG with Avicus, and i understand there are personal reasons that people leave, but why so MANY?

It's really beginning to depress me, people i admire and occasionally people i know just leave out of the blue! I'm completely into Avicus and am doing YouTube with it too, and I've been here 7 months, and am not bored or anything! Infact, I'm beginning to think of suggesting to the staff to make a forums page called "Leaving Posts" or something :(

I dunno guys, i just feel bemused at the moment...
